title: (x) Poster behind Erik Spiekermann in "Helvetica" movie - Glaser Stencil {Jan E}
content:
Can someone please ID the typeface on the poster behind Spiekermann in this shot from Helvetica? I apologize for the size of the image.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194119im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spiekermann_4160.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Remembering" similar to super thin Chevin - Gravur Condensed {Charles Grant}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194119/http:/typophile.com/node/41486 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Mars Hill Church website - Futura, Neue Helvetica Ext, Akzidenz-Grotesk Ext {Thomas B, Andrew J Sipe} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194119/http:/typophile.com/node/41272 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lenarubysradnick
